snippet.title: Lifeless Moon - Exclusive Announcement Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Check out a creepy and lonely view of space in this indie gameplay trailer for Lifeless Moon.

Lifeless Moon comes from the developers of Lifeless Planet and has you exploring a desolate moon as you solve puzzles and platform your way to safety. Of the upcoming indie games being shown this year, Lifeless Moon excels in conveying its indie horror tone. Lifeless Moon release on Steam in 2023.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
